subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants are not sure if Eli Manning will play Sunday against the Packers because of a bruised right shoulder so they are preparing Jared Lorenzen to make his first N.F.L. start.
snippet: The Giants are not sure if Eli Manning will play Sunday against the Packers because of a bruised right shoulder so they are preparing Jared Lorenzen to make his first N.F.L. start.
